Pairing: Bucky Barnes x Reader

Summary: You’re in the same friendgroup with Bucky. But he’s a little too flirty with you to be considered as “friends”.

Warnings: old-fashioned smut lmao, bucky is kinda a flirt/pervert (I’m sorry), unprotected sex, creampie (let’s ignore the fact that they didn’t use a condom though, I know that’s probably not how it went in the past so let’s just enjoy the smut)

also the scenarios may be not accurate to how it was back then soo I’m sorry if it doesn’t fit your imagination

Enjoy Reading! I hope you like this short one shot about our bucky-boy🦋

It was the year 1938, (Y/N) was sent to the local bakery, where she met one of her girl friends Dorothy. “We should meet up again with the others, have a picnic on the hill, where you can see the pretty night sky. It would be so much fun! The boys should come too.” her friend tried to persuade (Y/N) sweetly.

“I don’t know Doe. Also, I don’t think James likes me that much. I shouldn’t come if he does. He teases me a lot.” she toyed with her fingers while they were waiting for the baker to put the bread in a bag.

“Oh come on, don’t be a whaky! He’s head over heels, don’t you see?” Dorothy gently pushed the other girl. She has always been the “wilder” one of the two. (Y/N) was the sweet goody two shoes, while Dorothy was rather…daring. She basically didn’t care what other people talked about her. She always said “What does it matter? I’m living my own life without bothering anyone. So why do they bother me?”

“Really?- Thank you, sir.” (Y/N) smiled and payed for the bread.

“Yes my darling. In fact, I overheard him talking to Charlie the other day, he was swooning over how cute you looked.” Dorothy explained with a knowing smile, making (Y/N) blush and smile shyly in return. The two girls started walking home, when two guys came up to them, they were also from their friend group.

“Hi babe” one of them threw his arm around Doe and pecked her on the cheek, but Dorothy scrunched up her face and pushed the boy away.

“Ew, get off me William!” she exclaimed, wiping her cheek rather exaggerated. (Y/N) lightly giggled at that, because she knew that Dorothy was only playing. She knew that the girl had a huge crush on William and she also knew that they actually had something going on….and off. “Anyways, we’re hanging out tonight at our place on the hill. Don’t come too late, sucker! And don’t forget to bring the booze.” she pushed the boy out of her way and grabbed (Y/N)’s hand as they sassily walked away from the boys.

They arrived at (Y/N)’s place and ran up to her room. Dorothy decided to make a plan on how to basically seduce James Barnes tonight. (Y/N) should talk to him in private and confess. “Step one, is to look cute” Dorothy said, so they started looking for a pretty outfit that (Y/N) could wear. “You should totally wear that cute skirt, the plaid one. With that shirt.” Dorothy pointed over to the shirt she was talking about.

After (Y/N) changed clothes, the girls chatted a little longer before it was time to head out. Once they arrived at the hill, some of their friends were already waiting there. They greeted each other and talked a bit. When they thought it was dark enough, some guys and even girls, including Dorothy, started drinking bottles of alcohol.

(Y/N) looked over to James and felt the butterflies in her stomach go wild. She bit her lip to hide the smile. Dorothy, who saw her friend’s look pushed the girl and nodded over to James. “You should talk to him” she whispered.

“W-what? No! I can’t. I changed my mind, I’d rather swoon over him from afar.” (Y/N) panicked as she looked back at the boy and gasped when she saw that his eyes were already on her. He smirked at the girl and winked, looking back at Steve, whom he was having a conversation with. (Y/N)’s cheeks heated up in embarrassment and she looked down, when she felt Dorothy lightly push her teasingly.

“Oh my god he just totally winked at you. Go get him.” Dorothy giggled, making (Y/N) chuckle too. After some time the friendgroup was more layed back, having fun together and some were already a little tipsy, when (Y/N) finally collected all her courage as she stood up and waltzed over to the tall boy with blue eyes. If it wasn’t for Dorothy scolding her, she wouldn’t have done what she was about to do. (Y/N)’s heart was beating so fast and she was about to turn right back around, but Doe’s encouraging words did something to her and she felt strong and somehow free. She was ready to do something dangerous and not think about what her father or mother would say. She was about to talk to James, alone.

But by the time (Y/N) stood infront of him, she felt small again. He drifted his eyes up at her and smirked. “Well hello there.”

“H-hi. I-I have to talk to you….alone.” her last word made him smile even wider and he gave Steve a cheeky smirk over his shoulder. Steve only smiled shyly at (Y/N).

“Sure, where should we go to. Lead the way.” he stood up and looked down at the girl. She took in a breath and walked further into the forest, but not too far, just to make sure the others wouldn’t experience the rejection she was gonna face.

He grinned as he took her hands in his and pulled her closer to his body. “Why are you so shy now? Weren’t we going to make out?” she gasped again and looked anywhere but his eyes. He wouldn’t have minded it though, he had dreamt about kissing her plenty of times. And almost all of their friendgroup knew about his crush on you.

“I didn’t expect you to be so shy, kitten. For hanging out with Doe you’re very innocent, dare I say. Have you ever even kissed a boy?” he asked and she could’ve sworn that he moved his face closer. She gulped and shook her head. “Do you want to?” one of his hands was stil on her hip while the other one was cupping her cheek. “Do you want me to kiss you?” all worry and embarrassment was gone when (Y/N) slowly nodded and leaned into his touch. When she told Doe what had happened the other night, Dorothy couldn’t help but happily giggle and ask for details.

The girls were seated on a bench by the park and started making plans for future dates and how to get James to ask (Y/N) out when two boys sat down next to them, James Barnes and William.

William took Dorothy’s hand in his, to place a kiss on her knuckles, making the girl cringe and roll her eyes in fake annoyence. “What do you want, William.” she scoffed, but the boy only pulled the girl from her seat, dragging her along with him. Doe only apologetically looked over her shoulder and walked with him.

(Y/N) drifted her eyes to James, who was seated right next to her with an amused look on his face. “How have you been, dolly.” he smirked as he threw an arm over her shoulder. His face so close to hers, their lips almost touching.

“You just saw me yesterday.” she laughed and looked away, thinking back to the time when Dorothy had told her to make him beg for her. She bit her lip, as she followed a bird with her eyes, waiting for him to do something when he finally spoke up.

“Are you playing hard to get, because Doe told you it was a good idea to get my attention?” he spoke with a smirk as he cupped her chin, turning her head to face him. “Because if so, we could just skip this and get to the good part you know? We don’t have to wait. I mean we both like each other don’t we? Let me take you out on a fine date. Be mine?” he swiped his thumb over her bottom lip and leaned closer. “Not here James!” (Y/N) shook her head and slightly pushed him away. “You should ask me privately and with a little more romance don’t you think? This isn’t how you ask a woman to be yours“ she gave him a teasing look, before getting up and walking away, mentally patting her own shoulder. She was yet again, feeling very strong. His breath was fanning against her face as she looked up at him with big doe eyes.

He cupped her chin and kissed her messily, taking her breath away when she returned the kiss, he suddenly pulled away and repeated his question. “Go on a date with me. His voice sounded genuine and soft, making her blush and look down. “Let’s go doll.”
